title: Werewolf
summaries: The Werewolf is a Hardmode enemy that only spawns at night while a full moon is active, during which it is as common as a Zombie. Werewolves can open doors and have a 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) chance to inflict the Bleeding debuff. At close range, Werewolves attack the player by leaping or lunging, closing distances quickly to catch unwary players off-guard.
The Werewolf can drop the Moon Charm, which allows the player to transform into a Werewolf at night.

statistics.Environment: Surface + Night + Full Moon
